name: ChildrenBreak
description:
ChildrenBreak is an asymmetrical horror game first and third person. You can access to two modes: 8 against 1 and 4 against 1. You will embody a survivor and you will need to escape. To help you in your journey, you will need weapons and other tools to achieve your goals. You can also embody a killer who has specific objects and powers! Be careful not to be distracted by a survivor for others to escape! Your role is to kill all of them! Each survivor will have a specificity such as: repair faster, more stamina...



As a survivor, you will have access to multitudes of weapons like a baseball bat, wooden branches, glasses, vases... to knock out the killer! Repair the car, call the police, repair the boat... are good ways to escape the killer. But be careful: each killer does not have the same weakness! If you escape alone or with others, you win the game.



As a killer, you have, depending on the chosen killer, specific powers or objects! Use them to track down your prey and make them taste sudden death! No pity, just violence! No one should escape from your area. If all the survivors escape, you lose the game.
